sense.def:
To knock at a door or window
pomeni večkrat zapovrstjo udariti po vratih ali oknu, da bi pritegnili pozornost neke osebe.

seg.quote: He knocked softly on the door.
There was a knock at the door.

sense.def:
To knock something
pomeni nekaj grobo udariti, da se premakne ali prevrne.

seg.quote: In the excitement he knocked over his chair.
The glass had been knocked out from windows.
Knocks can cause weaknesses in the spine.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
ADJUNCT
or
COMPLEMENT

sense.def:
To knock someone down
ali
to knock someone unconscious
pomeni nekoga tako močno udariti, da pade ali omedli.

seg.quote: Dad knocked him to the floor.
Rudolph had seen him knock Thomas unconscious with his fist.

sense.def:
To knock someone or something
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj kritizirati;

seg.quote: He was always knocking the performance of fellow-actors.

sense.def:
To be knocked about
ali
to be knocked around
pomeni, da tistega človeka nekdo večkrat udari;

seg.quote: He did not like the thought of a woman being knocked about.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
has knocked about
ali
has knocked around
, ima izkušnje s številnimi kraji ali okoliščinami;

seg.quote: I'm a bachelor, I've knocked about the world a bit.

sense.def:
To knock back a drink
pomeni hitro spiti pijačo;

Kadar neko vozilo
knocks someone down
, nekega človeka zadene tako, da umre ali je ranjen.

seg.quote: He was knocked down by a bus.

sense.def:
To knock down a building
pomeni namenoma uničiti stavbo.

seg.quote: I'd knock the wall down between the two rooms.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
knocks an amount off the price of something
, za določen znesek zniža ceno tistega izdelka.

seg.quote: He knocked £50 off the price, because it was scratched.

sense.def:
To knock someone out
pomeni nekoga tako udariti, da omedli.

seg.quote: He hit me so hard he knocked me out.

sense.def:
Kadar neko mamilo
knocks someone out
, tisti človek po njegovem zaužitju postane omamljen.

seg.quote: The tablet had knocked her out for four hours.

sense.def:
Kadar neka oseba ali moštvo
is knocked out of a competition
, je na tekmi poraženo in ne sme več igrati.
